main event: An observer reported seeing one oval reddish object drifting north-west over Amarillo AFB for approximately one hour and forty-five minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of a pea held at arm's length,The observer first spotted the object at 30 degrees azimuth and 35 degrees elevation,The object faded out of sight at 320 degrees azimuth,The report concludes that the sighting was likely caused by a weather balloon released at the same time,The observation was made through a window.
witness description: Observer looking out from a building on Amarillo Air Force Base
